name: amazon
description: The purpose of this project is to build a MERN-Stack e-commerce website which i choose to replicate from [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/). The clone website has many main features similar to of Amazon which the user can interact for example sign in, sign up, update user, search & sort products, add to cart, make payment, track orders etc. This project follows the tutorial of building MERN-stack website, more information can be found with the link below. Also i have made some adjustments to make the website more realistic.

scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
